name: ThinkingIndicator
description: The ThinkingIndicator component displays an animated sequence of dots, typically to show that a process is ongoing, like an AI response being generated. The number of dots can be customized with the `count` prop. Example: `<ThinkingIndicator />`, additionally, you can use this by lets say the AI is still thinking, you can put this inside a ChatBubble component to show that the AI is still thinking. While there is still no response from the AI.
